mapper.insert: insert into TSysOper (FS_SYSOPERID, FS_SYSOPERNAME, FI_ADMINTYPE, FI_DEPNO, FS_SYSOPERPWD, FI_PWDSTAT, FI_STAT) values (#{sysOperId}, #{sysOperName}, #{adminType}, #{depNo}, #{sysOperPwd}, #{pwdStat}, #{stat})
mapper.update: UPDATE TSYSOPER SET FS_SYSOPERNAME = #{sysOperName}, FI_ADMINTYPE = #{adminType}, FI_DEPNO = #{depNo}, FS_SYSOPERPWD = #{sysOperPwd}, FI_PWDSTAT = #{pwdStat}, FI_STAT = #{stat} WHERE FS_SYSOPERID = #{sysOperId}
